name: Easyful
title: easyful.com
payoff: Sell digital products with no fees
shortDescription: Easyful simplifies the process of selling digital products by integrating directly with Stripe, allowing users to manage sales without additional fees. It is designed for entrepreneurs and small businesses looking to sell digital goods like ebooks, software, and more. Users can add products, set prices, and manage orders directly from their Stripe dashboard, making it an efficient tool for those looking to streamline their digital sales process.
pros: No additional fees with Stripe integration
Supports multiple currencies and digital wallets
cons: Dependent on Stripe's stability and features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: LemonSqueezy
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Similar focus on digital goods sales
